Params: {2: 'Murray', 3: "Morian! What's happening? Why are you locked up in this... this...?"}
{2: 'Murray', 3: 'What is all this? Why are there tubes coming out of you?'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: 'Are you sick? Morian? What did they do to you?!'}
{2: 'Morian', 3: "Listen to me. I might have to leave you for a short while, but don't worry."}
{2: 'Morian', 3: "Your brother's got a new job, and... it pays very well."}
{2: 'Morian', 3: "So you have to behave, you hear me? And you have to do the transplant surgery... You'll get better, and everything will be all right."}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "I'm going with you, Morian! I'll be good, I'll study, and I'll behave! Bring me with you, please!"}
{2: 'Morian', 3: 'Come on, how old are you now? Still acting like a spoiled child.'}
{2: 'Morian', 3: "I promise you, Murray... I'll... I'll come back to you..."}
